Package org.webpki.cbor

Class CBORMap

java.lang.Object
org.webpki.cbor.CBORObject
org.webpki.cbor.CBORMap
public class CBORMap
extends CBORObject
Class for holding CBOR maps. This class also provides support for signature creation and validation.
